title: How I created This Blog
description: This is how I created my blog with distill and Rmarkdown.
contents:
The links below are what i followed to build this blog. some basic
Rmarkdown and these links will get you up and going.
https://themockup.blog/posts/2020-08-01-building-a-blog-with-distill/
https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZOBXGxPH3Zo
Distill is a publication format for scientific and technical writing,
native to the web.
Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Tim's Memory Alpha Blog
description:
Welcome to my new blog, Tim's Memory Alpha Blog. I hope you enjoy 
reading what we have to say. This was built as a library of my own personal 
experances and knowlage base.
